name: Holonet Pirate Array

Add [BO] to intercept HoloNet traffic

added_mods.misc_desc: Additional planetary environment

description: Species of the galaxy live in vastly different environments, but most vessels are fitted with a standard environment. Adapting one's diplomatic vessel to the desires of their guests can really lighten the mood.
